it.unimib.disco.essere.functionalities

Class DataEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimib.disco.essere.functionalities.DataEvaluator

  • public class DataEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class fulfills all the responsibilities that concern to the evaluation of the classifiers, including the execution of the cross validation.

        public weka.classifiers.Evaluation crossValidation(weka.core.Instances dataset,
                                                   weka.classifiers.Classifier c)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform the crossvalidation using the default value for fold (10) and seed (1)
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset used for training and testing
        c - the classifier that have to be evaluated
        Returns:
        the instance use to evaluate the classifier
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • crossValidation

        public weka.classifiers.Evaluation crossValidation(weka.core.Instances dataset,
                                                   weka.classifiers.Classifier c,
                                                   int folds,
                                                   int seed)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform the cross validation
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset used for training and testing
        c - the classifier that have to be evaluated
        folds - number of fold used by the cross validation
        seed - the number used by the Random class for splitting the instances (usually is used 1)
        Returns:
        the instance use to evaluate the classifier
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • evaluate

        Evaluate the classifier
        Parameters:
        trainingDataset - the training dataset, as Instances
        testingDataset - the testing dataset, as Instances
        classifier - the classifier that have to be evaluated
        Returns:
        the instance use to evaluate the classifier
